attachments.title: billautomata/christmas_lights
attachments.text: christmas_lights - nodejs + raspi + gpio + relays = christmas

text: >Other egregious deviations from standard practice were the number of global variables in the system. (A variable is a location in memory that has a number in it. A global variable is any piece of software anywhere in the system can get to that number and read it or write it.) The academic standard is zero. Toyota had more than 10,000 global variables.
